name: calibration
description: Calibration library for synchronising bldc motor voltage models with digital absolute position rotary encoders

scripts.inspect:rotation-voltage-data: npm run test:venv && bokeh serve --port 8033 --show tune-rotation-voltage-data-smoothing.py --args ${npm_config_run_id}
scripts.perform-all-analysis: npm run combine:rotation-voltage-network-data --run_id=${npm_config_run_id} > ./calibration-data/${npm_config_run_id}/combine.performance.txt && npm run smooth:rotation-voltage-data --run_id=${npm_config_run_id} && npm run detect:zero-crossing --run_id=${npm_config_run_id} && npm run cluster:zero-crossing --run_id=${npm_config_run_id} --number_of_poles=14 && npm run analyse:zero-crossing-channel-clusters --run_id=${npm_config_run_id} && npm run inspect:zero-crossing --run_id=${npm_config_run_id} && npm run cluster-inliers:zero-crossing --run_id=${npm_config_run_id} --number_of_poles=14 && npm run analyse-inliers:zero-crossing-channel-clusters --run_id=${npm_config_run_id} && npm run inspect-inliers:zero-crossing --run_id=${npm_config_run_id}
scripts.perform-clustering-analysis: npm run detect:zero-crossing --run_id=${npm_config_run_id} && npm run cluster:zero-crossing --run_id=${npm_config_run_id} --number_of_poles=14 && npm run analyse:zero-crossing-channel-clusters --run_id=${npm_config_run_id} && npm run inspect:zero-crossing --run_id=${npm_config_run_id} && npm run cluster-inliers:zero-crossing --run_id=${npm_config_run_id} --number_of_poles=14 && npm run analyse-inliers:zero-crossing-channel-clusters --run_id=${npm_config_run_id} && npm run inspect-inliers:zero-crossing --run_id=${npm_config_run_id}
